rule_description_txt: Conservative hybrid model for crypto swing trades; uses wider stops, reduced position size, partial exits, and breakeven stop after partial. Trails remainder with EMA/chandelier and includes time-based exits. May also be applied at trader discretion regardless of triggers.
tqs_calc_params: {"tqs_schema":"v2-weights+bucket-calcs","buckets":["trend","vol_liq","rr","prob","catalyst"],"weights":{"trend":2,"vol_liq":2,"rr":2.25,"prob":2.25,"catalyst":1.5},"calc":{"method":"weighted_normalized_sum","bucket_max":2,"normalize_to":10,"round_to":0},"bucket_calcs":{"trend":{"inputs":["price","ema20","ema50","ema20_slope_bps_per_day"],"formula":"s_alignment = clamp01(((price/ema20-1)+(ema20/ema50-1))/trend_spread_good); s_slope = clamp01(ema20_slope_bps_per_day/slope_good); score = 2*clamp01(0.7*s_alignment+0.3*s_slope)","params":{"trend_spread_good":0.03,"slope_good":5}},"vol_liq":{"inputs":["atr14_pct","dollar_volume_24h"],"formula":"s_atr = 1-clamp01((atr14_pct-atr_good)/max(1e-9,atr_worst-atr_good)); s_vol = clamp01((dollar_volume_24h-vol_border)/max(1e-9,vol_good-vol_border)); score = 2*clamp01(0.5*s_atr+0.5*s_vol)","params":{"atr_good":5.0,"atr_worst":15.0,"vol_border":250000,"vol_good":1000000}},"rr":{"inputs":["rr_ratio","portfolio_risk_pct_proxy"],"formula":"s_rr = clamp01((rr_ratio-rr_border)/max(1e-9,rr_good-rr_border)); s_risk = 1-clamp01((portfolio_risk_pct_proxy-risk_good)/max(1e-9,risk_worst-risk_good)); score = 2*clamp01(0.6*s_rr+0.4*s_risk)","params":{"rr_border":1.2,"rr_good":1.8,"risk_good":2.0,"risk_worst":4.0}},"prob":{"inputs":["profit_probability_pct"],"formula":"score = 2*clamp01((profit_probability_pct-p_border)/max(1e-9,p_good-p_border))","params":{"p_border":40,"p_good":60}},"catalyst":{"inputs":["catalyst_signal","trend_precheck"],"formula":"score_raw = (catalyst_signal+1)/2; score = 2*clamp01(0.9*trend_precheck*score_raw + 0.1*(1-trend_precheck)*0.5)","params":{}}}}

rule_description_txt: Conservative crypto swing model for high-risk conditions; designed for extreme volatility, low liquidity, or news-driven moves. Inherits 4C-C logic with stricter entry/exit rules.
tqs_calc_params: {"tqs_schema":"v2-weights+bucket-calcs","buckets":["trend","vol_liq","rr","prob","catalyst"],"weights":{"trend":2,"vol_liq":2,"rr":2.5,"prob":2.5,"catalyst":1},"calc":{"method":"weighted_normalized_sum","bucket_max":2,"normalize_to":10,"round_to":0},"bucket_calcs":{"trend":{"inputs":["price","ema20","ema50","ema20_slope_bps_per_day"],"formula":"s_alignment = clamp01(((price/ema20-1)+(ema20/ema50-1))/trend_spread_good); s_slope = clamp01(ema20_slope_bps_per_day/slope_good); score = 2*clamp01(0.6*s_alignment+0.4*s_slope)","params":{"trend_spread_good":0.03,"slope_good":5}},"vol_liq":{"inputs":["atr14_pct","dollar_volume_24h"],"formula":"s_atr = 1-clamp01((atr14_pct-atr_good)/max(1e-9,atr_worst-atr_good)); s_vol = clamp01((dollar_volume_24h-vol_border)/max(1e-9,vol_good-vol_border)); score = 2*clamp01(0.5*s_atr+0.5*s_vol)","params":{"atr_good":5.0,"atr_worst":15.0,"vol_border":250000,"vol_good":1000000}},"rr":{"inputs":["rr_ratio","portfolio_risk_pct_proxy"],"formula":"s_rr = clamp01((rr_ratio-rr_border)/max(1e-9,rr_good-rr_border)); s_risk = 1-clamp01((portfolio_risk_pct_proxy-risk_good)/max(1e-9,risk_worst-risk_good)); score = 2*clamp01(0.7*s_rr+0.3*s_risk)","params":{"rr_border":1.2,"rr_good":1.8,"risk_good":2.0,"risk_worst":4.0}},"prob":{"inputs":["profit_probability_pct"],"formula":"score = 2*clamp01((profit_probability_pct-p_border)/max(1e-9,p_good-p_border))","params":{"p_border":40,"p_good":60}},"catalyst":{"inputs":["catalyst_signal","trend_precheck"],"formula":"score_raw = (catalyst_signal+1)/2; score = 2*clamp01(0.6*trend_precheck*score_raw + 0.4*(1-trend_precheck)*0.5)","params":{}}}}

rule_description_txt: Standard hybrid model for crypto swing trades; normal stops, full size, balanced R/R.
tqs_calc_params: {"tqs_schema":"v2-weights+bucket-calcs","buckets":["trend","vol_liq","rr","prob","catalyst"],"weights":{"trend":2,"vol_liq":2,"rr":2,"prob":2,"catalyst":2},"calc":{"method":"weighted_normalized_sum","bucket_max":2,"normalize_to":10,"round_to":0},"bucket_calcs":{"trend":{"inputs":["price","ema20","ema50","ema20_slope_bps_per_day"],"formula":"s_alignment = clamp01(((price/ema20-1)+(ema20/ema50-1))/trend_spread_good); s_slope = clamp01(ema20_slope_bps_per_day/slope_good); score = 2*clamp01(0.7*s_alignment+0.3*s_slope)","params":{"trend_spread_good":0.03,"slope_good":5}},"vol_liq":{"inputs":["atr14_pct","dollar_volume_24h"],"formula":"s_atr = 1-clamp01((atr14_pct-atr_good)/max(1e-9,atr_worst-atr_good)); s_vol = clamp01((dollar_volume_24h-vol_border)/max(1e-9,vol_good-vol_border)); score = 2*clamp01(0.5*s_atr+0.5*s_vol)","params":{"atr_good":5.0,"atr_worst":15.0,"vol_border":250000,"vol_good":1000000}},"rr":{"inputs":["rr_ratio","portfolio_risk_pct_proxy"],"formula":"s_rr = clamp01((rr_ratio-rr_border)/max(1e-9,rr_good-rr_border)); s_risk = 1-clamp01((portfolio_risk_pct_proxy-risk_good)/max(1e-9,risk_worst-risk_good)); score = 2*clamp01(0.6*s_rr+0.4*s_risk)","params":{"rr_border":1.2,"rr_good":1.8,"risk_good":2.0,"risk_worst":4.0}},"prob":{"inputs":["profit_probability_pct"],"formula":"score = 2*clamp01((profit_probability_pct-p_border)/max(1e-9,p_good-p_border))","params":{"p_border":40,"p_good":60}},"catalyst":{"inputs":["catalyst_signal","trend_precheck"],"formula":"score_raw = (catalyst_signal+1)/2; score = 2*clamp01(trend_precheck*score_raw + (1-trend_precheck)*0.5)","params":{}}}}

rule_description_txt: Standard equity swing model; aligns with market/sector trend; holds 3–10 trading days; avoid earnings ±2 days unless event trade.
tqs_calc_params: {"tqs_schema":"v2-weights+bucket-calcs","buckets":["trend","vol_liq","rr","prob","catalyst"],"weights":{"trend":2,"vol_liq":2,"rr":2.5,"prob":2,"catalyst":1.5},"calc":{"method":"weighted_normalized_sum","bucket_max":2,"normalize_to":10,"round_to":0},"bucket_calcs":{"trend":{"inputs":["price","ema20","ema50","ema20_slope_bps_per_day"],"formula":"s_alignment = clamp01(((price/ema20-1)+(ema20/ema50-1))/trend_spread_good); s_slope = clamp01(ema20_slope_bps_per_day/slope_good); score = 2*clamp01(0.7*s_alignment+0.3*s_slope)","params":{"trend_spread_good":0.02,"slope_good":4}},"vol_liq":{"inputs":["atr14_pct","dollar_volume_24h"],"formula":"s_atr = 1-clamp01((atr14_pct-atr_good)/max(1e-9,atr_worst-atr_good)); s_vol = clamp01((dollar_volume_24h-vol_border)/max(1e-9,vol_good-vol_border)); score = 2*clamp01(0.5*s_atr+0.5*s_vol)","params":{"atr_good":2.5,"atr_worst":8.0,"vol_border":3000000,"vol_good":10000000}},"rr":{"inputs":["rr_ratio","portfolio_risk_pct_proxy"],"formula":"s_rr = clamp01((rr_ratio-rr_border)/max(1e-9,rr_good-rr_border)); s_risk = 1-clamp01((portfolio_risk_pct_proxy-risk_good)/max(1e-9,risk_worst-risk_good)); score = 2*clamp01(0.65*s_rr+0.35*s_risk)","params":{"rr_border":1.3,"rr_good":2.0,"risk_good":1.5,"risk_worst":3.0}},"prob":{"inputs":["profit_probability_pct"],"formula":"score = 2*clamp01((profit_probability_pct-p_border)/max(1e-9,p_good-p_border))","params":{"p_border":45,"p_good":65}},"catalyst":{"inputs":["catalyst_signal","trend_precheck"],"formula":"score_raw = (catalyst_signal+1)/2; score = 2*clamp01(0.7*trend_precheck*score_raw + 0.3*(1-trend_precheck)*0.5)","params":{}}}}
prob_trend_features: EMA20 / EMA50 slope, RSI divergence, volume trend
prob_mktimpl_features:
[ 
    implied_volatility_rank, put_call_open_interest_skew, option_volume_skew,
    term_structure_slope, realized_vs_implied_vol, skew_index
]
